title: Inquiry About New Service Charge
description: A customer is calling to ask about a new 'Grid Modernization Charge' that appeared on their bill.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and locate the new charge on their billing statement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the specified charge on the customer's bill.

tasks.description: Access the internal knowledge base to find the official, regulator-approved explanation for the new charge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the approved script explaining the purpose of the charge.

tasks.description: Clearly explain the purpose of the charge to the customer using the information from the knowledge base.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately and clearly communicates the reason for the new charge.
